testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: On the Profile page, when clicked, there should be transitions
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user verifies that they are on the mainLogin page..................passed And The user clicks on the Admin Login button...............................passed Then The user verifies that they are on the "adminSiteLoginUrl" page........passed And The user enters their mail address and password to the mailtextbox and passwordtextbox.passed And The user clicks on the Sign In button...................................passed And The user clicks on the profile icon on the admin panels top bar.........passed And The user clicks on the profile link.....................................passed And The user verifies that they are linked to the profile page..............passed Then The user verifies that there are transitions to the Profile, Payroll, Leaves, Attendance, Documents pages and the General Information, Address Details, Bank Account Details, and Social Media Link information should be displayed..passed
